EmailTemplate.description: Sent to subscription account manager when LMS subscription enters renewing phase
EmailTemplate.name: LMS renewal has started
EmailTemplate.subject: An LMS subscription has entered the renewal process
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear Account Manager
{!Subscription__c.Contact__c} at {!Subscription__c.Account_Name__c} is about to renew an e-learning subscription. Please contact them to review their package.
You have until {!Subscription__c.First_Reminder_Date__c} to make any changes to the subscription before the invoice is created and sent to client.
Subscription: {!Subscription__c.Link}
Many thanks
Your friendly neighbourhood Salesforce team
